jobDescription: Would you like to work in a collaborative environment at a state of the art facility in Fullerton, California? Then join our Raytheon team of smart people solving problems that make the world a safer place and help to secure our great nation! Come support those who provide us with all the freedoms we enjoy.  The Raytheon Intelligence, Information and Services (IIS) Configuration and Data Management (CMDM) team is seeking a highly motivated Data Management Configuration Analyst. This position will provide data management (DM) support to engineering programs in Fullerton, California and will be responsible for determining DM requirements and administering DM activities to ensure compliance with contract requirements. The Data Manager works closely with Program Management, Contracts, Engineering, Configuration Management, and functional personnel assigned to the program to accomplish this task. The candidate must be a flexible team player with the ability to prioritize and juggle multiple concurrent tasks in a diverse environment. A current DoD SECRET clearance (or higher) is required. Key Responsibilities:Developing and implementing Data Management principles, processes and training, configuration control, library/repository facilitation, and product release and delivery.Ensures
